title: Five hour sunset
description: It's day one, so not a huge number of photos, most of the day was spend building this site while chasing the setting sun across the Atlantic en route to Rio (site improvements in the coming days). Photos can be found down below, I likely won't upload every day while other days I might pop some bonus text content under the photos. Those expecting beautiful prose turn back now.

title: Copacabana
description: Checked into the Pura Vida Hostel and found out a few fun things today: #1 Universal travel adaptors don't work in Brazil. #2 Chase debit cards don't work at ATM's in Brazil. #3 My sweat glands work really well in Brazil, it is humid af. For more revelations (plus that image of south america replaced with something else) tune in tomorrow.
